channel.title: Server is acting as weird as shit?
channel.description:
im almost done coding my source.. but i never checked if people could login or not. Im trying on hamachi so i first turned on Hamachi and then the server and gave the people my hamachi ip and they couldnt connect so i tried i different source and they connected to it
what could be wrong with my server? is it the run.bat? any idea on how to fix it? its Delta based
any help peeps?

item.title: Server is acting as weird as shit?
item.dc:creator: @disastercall disastercall
item.description:
@disastercall wrote:

Thanks:

Maybe don’t use hamachi

its not hamachi thats the problem lol the other server worked perfectly with hamachi its something with my source but i have no idea what

Read full topic
